title: Video: FKA Twigs – Water Me
body:
With production from the recently hyped **Arca**, **Twigs** (who will here on out be referred to as **FKA Twigs** – formerly known as), Water Me is set to be one of this years biggest tracks.

A minimal composition, relying almost solely upon the breathy vocals of London’s **Twigs**, the track is taken from her forthcoming EP2, out 10 September on Young Turks. The follow up to last years breakthrough release, EP1, _Water Me_ is further confirmation that FKA Twigs is one of the most exciting new artists around. Check out the fantastic Jesse Kanda produced video below.

EP2 Tracklist:  
1\. How’s That  
2\. Water Me  
3\. Papi Pacify  
4\. Ultraviolet
